title: Excitement on a Snowy Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Look, look, Riko-san! It’s snowing, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It really is. No wonder I thought it was cold today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Do you think it’ll stick? If it does, Rin wants to have a big snowball fight with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>A snowball fight sounds fun, but I’d want to make snow bunnies with everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Snow bunnies are cute too, nya~! Rin wants to make µ’s snow bunnies!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah! Rin wants to make a snow dome, nya! Then we could all stay in it and have hot pot together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Wow~, that’s a good idea too! It sounds really fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Right, right!? I hope the snow’ll stick soon~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmhm, even though it’s cold, you’re still full of energy, huh, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>When it’s snowing, Rin gets excited, nya! Alright, Riko-san, let’s start by going on a run!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
